name: Kathmandu
title: Kathmandu
content: Kathmandu valley consists of three ancient cities: Kathmandu, Patan and Bhaktapur, which were once independent states ruled by the Malla kings from the 12th to the 18th centuries

name: Chitwan
title: Chitwan
content: Chitwan, the popular Inner Terai valley, lies between foothills of the Himalaya, the Mahabharat and Siwalik ranges which gets its name from Chitrasen, the Tharu King, who once ruled here

name: Momo
title: Momo
content: Momo is prepared using minced chicken, mutton, grated paneer, cheese or vegetables. While the momos are mainly steamed, they are also fried or eaten with soup
